name: Bangkok Kitchen
description: Authentic Thai cuisine with a modern twist. Our chefs use fresh local ingredients to create traditional dishes with unique flavors.

name: Sushi Bang
description: Premium Japanese sushi restaurant offering the freshest seafood and traditional preparation methods.

name: Pasta Paradise
description: Authentic Italian pasta and pizza made with imported ingredients and traditional recipes.

name: Spice of India
description: Rich and flavorful Indian cuisine with a wide variety of vegetarian and non-vegetarian options.

name: Sue's Burgers
description: Juicy gourmet burgers with a variety of toppings and homemade sauces. Also serving craft beers.

name: Dim Sum House
description: Traditional Chinese dim sum and Cantonese specialties served in a cozy atmosphere.

name: Taco Fiesta
description: Authentic Mexican tacos, burritos, and quesadillas with homemade salsas and guacamole.

name: Bang Sue Bistro
description: French-inspired bistro offering classic dishes with a Thai twist. Elegant atmosphere and fine wines.
